TI_TEXT.P: Услуги по разработване на софтуер за създаване на документи, чертане, обработка на изображения, планиране и повишаване на ефективността

Services de développement de logiciels de création de documents, de dessin, de traitement de l'image, d'ordonnancemennt et de productivité
Document creation, drawing, imaging, scheduling and productivity software development services
Usluge razvoja programske podrške za stvaranje dokumenta, crtanje, slikovni prikaz, vremensko planiranje i produktivnost
Dokumentumkészítő, rajzoló, képkezelő, termelésütemező és termelékenységnövelő szoftverek fejlesztésével kapcsolatos szolgáltatások
Servizi di programmazione di software per creazioni di documenti, disegni, immagini, programmazione e produttività
Dokumentų kūrimo, braižymo, vaizdo gavimo, grafikų sudarymo ir našumo programinės įrangos kūrimo paslaugos
Dokumentu izveides, zīmēšanas, attēlveidošanas, plānošanas un darba grupu uzturēšanas programmatūras izstrādes pakalpojumi
Servizzi ta' żvilupp ta' softwer għall-ħolqien ta' dokumenti, tpinġija, ħolqien ta' immaġni, skedar u produttività
Diensten voor ontwikkeling van software voor het maken van documenten, tekeningen, afbeeldingen, dienstregelingen en productiviteit

Servicii de dezvoltare de software pentru creare de documente, pentru desen, imagistică, planificare şi productivitate
Služby na vývoj softvéru na vytváranie dokumentov, kreslenie, vytváranie obrázkov, harmonogramov a na zlepšovanie produktivity
Storitve razvoja programske opreme za ustvarjanje dokumentov, risanje, zajem slik, časovno načrtovanje in storilnost
Programvaruutvecklingstjänster för dokumentredigering, ritning, bildhantering, schemaläggning och produktivitet

TITLE.P: Pictures and video in EPJ for the primary health service

SHORT_DESCR.P: An EPJ improvement involves raising the quality of physiotherapists, GPs and contract specialists' EPJ system and it shall contribute to the development of an ICT tool that ensures the quality of patient treatment, supports interaction and information exchange between the actors in the sector and gives a more efficient use of resources. An established management group shall follow-up the allocation of resources for EPJ development and electronic interaction. The Directorate for Health and the Directorate for eHealth shall be the project owner, process driver and will have the secretariat function in the management group.

A procurement is planned so as to be able to take pictures and videos with medical technical equipment/mobiles and subsequently process and exchange them in the EPJ. This is a system that shall function between physiotherapists, GPs and contract specialists.
The Directorate for eHealth would like to invite suppliers to an information meeting.
Register for the information meeting by sending an email to: lars.hoel@nhn.no

A procurement is planned so as to be able to take pictures and videos with medical technical equipment/mobiles and subsequently process and exchange them in the EPJ. This is a system that shall function between physiotherapists, GPs and contract specialists.
